action_output_list: To set an alarm, I need to open the Clock app.{"action_type": "open_app", "app_name": "Clock"}

The user wants to set an alarm for 15:30. The current screen shows the alarm setting interface. I need to set the hour to 15 and the minute to 30. First, I will click on the hour to change it.{"action_type": "click", "index": 11}
